alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Fergus County below 4500ft; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 10 at 8:40AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris and damage property. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
